name: Digital Education Policy
description: Policy for digital transformation in education sector
view_full_policy: This comprehensive policy outlines the roadmap for integrating digital technologies into the education system. Key areas include: 1) Infrastructure development with high-speed internet in all schools, 2) Digital literacy training for teachers and students, 3) Online learning platform development, 4) Digital resource creation and curation, 5) Assessment and evaluation frameworks for digital learning outcomes.
